title: Metal Bastard's QOTSA Rarities Mixes Vol. 1-3
description:
Three mixes of QOTSA non-album tracks that I made back in 2009. I kept getting request for 'em, so here they are. Only 128 kbps, but whatever. That's life. Deal with it.


Volume 1:

1. Spiders and vinegaroons
2. Broken box (acoustic)
3. Six shooter (acoustic)
4. Not to touch the earth (The Doors cover)
5. The blood is love (Contradictor remix
6. The bronze
7. Burn the witch (acoustic)
8. Christian brothers (Elliot Smith cover)
9. Four corners (acoustic Mondo Generator cover)
10. You're so vague
11. Wake up screaming (Subhumans cover)
12. I never came (acoustic)
13. Born to hula
14. Te voy a dejar (acoustic)
15. Who'll be the next in line (The Kinks cover)
16. Never say never (Romeo Void cover)
17. Hangin' tree (acoustic)
18. No one knows (extended live version)


Volume 2:

1. This lullaby (Josh version)
2. Like a drug
3. White wedding (Billy Idol cover)
4. Everybody's gonna be happy (The Kinks cover)
5. Leg of Lamb (acoustic)
6. Running joke
7. Rickshaw
8. If only everything
9. These aren't the droids you're looking for
10. Infinity
11. Goin' out west (Tom Waits cover)
12. Era vulgaris (feat. Trent Reznor)
13. You can't put your arms around a memory (acoustic Johnny Thunders cover)
14. No one knows (U.N.K.L.E. reconstruction)
15. A song for the dead (radio edit)
16. Born to hula (alternate version)
17. Little sister (Contradictor remix)
18. Detroit (acoustic Mondo Generator cover)
19. The fun machine took a shit and died


Volume 3:

1. The real song for the deaf
2. Needle in the camel's eye (Brian Eno cover)
3. Avon (live)
4. The most exalted potentate of love (The Cramps cover)
5. Gonna leave you (Spanish version)
6. Ode to Clarissa
7. Infinity (alternate version)
8. Bloody hammer (Roky Erickson cover)
9. Covered in punks blood (live)
10. Back to Dungaree High (Turbonegro cover)
11. I want you to die (acoustic Mondo Generator cover)
12. Quick and to the pointless (live)
13. 18 A.D.
14. Go with the flow (live)
15. The fun machine took a shit and died (vinyl version)
16. Make it wit chu (acoustic)
17. Born to hula (alternate version)
18. Precious and grace (ZZ Top version)
19. A song for the dead (live)
